Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Countless Program Ghosts stand in the path leading to "Bianca".'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Every single one of these Program Ghosts bears a clear mark pointing to a direction... Tch, not even trying to be discreet anymore, uh?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not that she could have, anyway, with so many of them standing out here. We need to get rid of these Program Ghosts to move ahead, though.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Right... And we don't have time to fix every one of them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia, this is a choice we need to make.', 4: '2'}
